header.title: Catch the Grinch
sidebar.pointsInfo: Event Points are an additional currency available during special events, which can be used in event modes.
pages.howTo.title: How to get Event Points?
pages.howTo.step1.title: EVENT CASES
pages.howTo.step1.desc: Open event cases, in addition to skins, you can get bonus EP in them!
pages.howTo.step2.title: Add Funds
pages.howTo.step2.desc: Top up your Key-Drop account, and you will receive bonus EP with each top-up!
pages.cardLevels.title: Christmas Balls
pages.cardLevels.desc: Collect level 1 Christmas Balls to access the next level.
pages.cardLevels.content.error.balanceTo: You need {{coins}} Event Points to open the skin! Check how to do it.
pages.cardLevels.content.error.errorDown: There was a problem 817, try again later.
pages.cardLevels.content.error.errorScra: An unexpected error occurred while scratching cards.
pages.cardLevels.rules.one.title: Collect
pages.cardLevels.rules.one.desc: REVEAL CARDS FROM EACH LEVEL. THE HIGHER THE CARD LEVEL, THE BETTER THE CHANCE OF GETTING A BETTER SKIN.
pages.cardLevels.rules.two.title: Levels
pages.cardLevels.rules.two.desc: TO UNLOCK THE NEXT LEVEL OF CHRISTMAS BALLS, COLLECT AT LEAST ONE BALL FROM THE PREVIOUS LEVEL.
pages.cardLevels.rules.three.title: New Cards
pages.cardLevels.rules.three.desc: NEW CARDS ARE AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED AFTER REFRESHING THE PAGE.
pages.pairToPair.title: Pair to Pair
pages.pairToPair.desc: Find two identical Viking cards and claim a skin.
pages.pairToPair.levels.one.title: Lagertha
pages.pairToPair.levels.two.title: Bjorn
pages.pairToPair.levels.three.title: Ivar
pages.pairToPair.levels.fourth.title: Ragnar
pages.pairToPair.congratsDescription: Your reward from Pair to Pair
pages.pairToPair.rules.one.title: Cards
pages.pairToPair.rules.one.desc: You can find 4 different cards representing 4 different Viking heroes. Each offers a different reward.
pages.pairToPair.rules.two.title: Skins
pages.pairToPair.rules.two.desc: Spend Event Points to reveal their fields. You will automatically win a prize when you find a match.
pages.pairToPair.rules.three.title: New cards
pages.pairToPair.rules.three.desc: You can generate a new set of cards at any time.
pages.pairToPair.error.balanceTooLow.mes: You need {{coins}} Event Points to open the card.
pages.exchanger.title: Changer
pages.exchanger.desc: Exchange Event Points for skins. The more Event Points you spend, the better skins you'll get!
pages.exchanger.content.title: Exchange Event Points for skins
pages.exchanger.content.note: The more Event Points you exchange, the better your chance of scoring an awesome skin.
pages.exchanger.content.actions.inputLab: ENTER THE AMOUNT OF EVENT POINTS TO EXCHANGE
pages.exchanger.content.error.exchangeEr: Something went wrong, please try again
pages.exchanger.content.error.balanceToo: You don't have enough Event Points.
pages.exchanger.rules.one.title: Exchange
pages.exchanger.rules.one.desc: Enter the amount of Event Points you want to exchange for a skin.
pages.exchanger.rules.two.title: Skins
pages.exchanger.rules.two.desc: Rewards are random and depend on your luck.
pages.exchanger.rules.three.title: Reward
pages.exchanger.rules.three.desc: The more Event Points you exchange, the better your chance of scoring an awesome skin.
pages.eventPass.title: Event Pass
pages.eventPass.desc: Reach the next level to redeem free rewards. Upgrade to the Premium Pass to get even more!
pages.eventPass.premiumPassQuestion: Are you sure you want to buy the Premium Pass?
pages.ranking.title: Event Leaderboard
pages.ranking.desc: Collect Event Points, climb the Leaderboard, and earn the best skins.
pages.ranking.note.text: Are you on the Leaderboard? Collect as many Event Points as possible to reach the podium and get the best skins.
pages.workshop.title: Workshop
pages.workshop.steps.one: Choose a car you want to work on. YOU CAN'T CHANGE IT, so choose carefully.
pages.workshop.steps.two: Unlock car parts by opening event cases and customize your car as you want.
pages.workshop.steps.three: Collect daily Event Points and the final reward (after claiming the final reward, you can't customize the car anymore).
pages.workshop.logIn: Log in to choose a car
pages.workshop.earningMoreEventPoints: earn more EP for you every day
pages.workshop.collectedEP: You have collected free EP today
pages.workshop.takeAward: I want to claim my reward
pages.workshop.buyCarConfirmationQuestio: Are you sure you want to buy this card?
pages.workshop.awardConfirmationQuestion: Are you sure you want to claim the reward?
pages.workshop.awardConfirmationDescript: You won't be able to customize your car any further after claiming the reward.
pages.workshop.awardDescription: When you upgrade your card, each change earns you event points. If you're ready, you can stop upgrading and claim the reward.
pages.exchanger.mission.title: active quest
pages.exchanger.mission.subtitle: Exchange EP for Skins
pages.exchanger.mission.desc:
STARDATE 421.374.
SPACE COMMAND COMMUNICATION FOLLOWS:
CADET, GOOD LUCK ON YOUR SEARCH FOR RELICS OF PAST CIVILIZATIONS. EXCHANGE THE FUNDS YOU EARN TO FIND THEM. ANYTHING YOU FIND IS YOURS TO KEEP.
SPACE COMMAND OUT.
pages.calendar.title: Catch the Grinch
pages.calendar.desc: Open doors on the calendar every day and receive rewards. Each Advent Calendar Day ends at 11 PM UTC.
pages.calendar.selectionDescription: You can change your choice and buy a Premium Advent Calendar at any time.
pages.calendar.premiumSteps.one.title: One time payment {{value}}
pages.calendar.premiumSteps.one.desc: Buy the Calendar using your Key-Drop balance and redeem prizes.
pages.calendar.premiumSteps.two.title: Open doors every day
pages.calendar.premiumSteps.two.desc: Open doors every day and redeem prizes. Remember that if you skip a day in the Calendar, you won't be able to reveal a prize for that day BONUS! If you buy a Calendar before December 5th, you'll be able to open all the doors up to that date. Note: This does not apply if you've previously redeemed one of the fields for free.
pages.calendar.premiumSteps.three.title: Value for money!
pages.calendar.premiumSteps.three.desc: From December 6th onward, the Advent Calendar will be cheaper proportionally to the number of days remaining.
pages.calendar.premiumBonusInfo: *To redeem the guaranteed prize, you need to open all 24 Premium Calendar doors.
pages.calendar.premiumBuyFor: Pick and redeem a Calendar for
pages.calendar.basicDescription: Open the Calendar every day and used Event Points to reduce the cost of the next calendar doors.
pages.calendar.basicSteps.one.title: Open starting on the first day
pages.calendar.basicSteps.one.desc: Use the collected Event Points and open the Calendar step by step.
pages.calendar.basicSteps.two.title: Keep at it
pages.calendar.basicSteps.two.desc: Open the calendar every day to make the next door cheaper.
pages.calendar.basicSteps.three.title: Don't skip any days!
pages.calendar.basicSteps.three.desc: If you skip a day in the Calendar, the price for the next door will return to normal, and you'll have to start over
pages.calendar.basicBonusInfo: To lower the price for each door in the Calendar, you have to open it daily throughout the event. If you skip even one day, the prices will reset.
pages.calendar.openFor: Pick and redeem a Calendar for Event Points.
pages.calendar.error.balanceTooLow.messa: Your Event Points balance is too low.
